attributes.action: Put speed humps down Buchanan way in Latchingdon essex
attributes.additional_details: To slow drivers down as they drive too fast down this residential road killing family animals and hitting parked cars!!! Will end up killing somone if this Carries on!
attributes.background: Put speed bumps down Buchanan way in Latchingdon essex to slow drivers down .

rejection.details:
Decisions about local traffic calming measures are a matter for your local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could petition Essex County Council directly about this: https://www.essex.gov.uk/get-involved/petitions
